body.name: REORIA Women's Cute High Neck Double Lined Long Sleeve Slim Fitted T Shirt Trendy Going Out Crop Tops
features: Fabric type 🌸Material: 75%Polyester+25%Spandex. This cropped long sleeve top updated in the smoothing, buttery soft, high-stretch fabric that perfectly hugs your curves and could make you feel warm and comfortable to wear all day.

🌸Double lined has just the right support and elastic, even the light colors are not see through. The basic crop tops thick but light weight, fitted fit, not rolled up and keeps you casual and looking good no matter what!
🌸The slim fit high-neck long sleeve design easily fits any figure, especially for hourglass or curvy girls that perfectly smooths and contours for a trendy, sexy, chic and cool look.

🌸Size: S--bust--28.3”; M--bust--30.3”; L--bust--32.7”; XL--bust--35.0”; 2XL--bust--37.8”. Model is 5’3 135lbs 32DD & Jean size 27/28 , size Medium, fit perfect, this long sleeve t shirt is machine washable and it was not deformed or shrunk after washing.

🌸Reach your new season style with attracted to you slimming long sleeve tops for women. Match with your favourite skirt, sneakers, jacket set or coat for new everyday fashion styling or wide leg jeans and a puffer vest for a casual but cute look.

🌸The fitted Y2K long sleeve crop top T shirts are also perfect for spring, fall, winter, daily life, going out, yoga, workout but not hard athletic activity(not padded bras), gym, birthday, brunch, country concert, work, business, Halloween costume, party club night, date night, vacation, etc, and other occasions.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: WE ARE GOING TO DRESS YOU UP TO A MODERN LADY AT THE FOREFRONT OF FASHION. Womens Basic Fitted High Neck Long Sleeve Cropped Tee Shirts Y2k Crop Tops >>>An essential basic styling piece to add to your rotation. The high neck design gives it a unique and trendy appearance that stands out and adds a touch of exquisit to cropped long sleeve top.This long sleeve womens tops hugs the body in the right places, giving a flattering silhouette without feeling tight.Perfect for Spring, a cooler Summer day,Fall, Winter, daily life, going out,ect. Wear it alone or as a base layer for unmatched comfort and easy styling.

Its simplicity is its strength and keeps you casual and looking good no matter what! High Stretchy, Seamless Precision Stitching makes this crop top more sturdy.The fabric is high quality, thick but light weight, fitted fit, not rolled up, double lining prevents see-through issues and is so cozy.Plus, it's durable and keeps its shape after multiple wears and washes.

Basic Style, Individual Versatile, Double The Charm of wearing it alone or as a base layer Q:Does it have a built-in bra? A:No, It is a double-lined can layer that holds the girl in the right position. Q:Are the arms long sleeves tight? A: No, this long sleeve is elastic, very soft, and comfy to wear, not tight. Q:Is the white see-through? A:No, because it is a double layer. Q:Does it shrink in the wash? A: No,it keeps its shape after washing. Q:Is it true to size? A: Yes, but this long sleeve crop top is slim-fitting. If you want a looser fitting, you could order one size up.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best shirt ever!
reviews.reviewText: This is the best shirt ever! It is SO soft and so well made! The fit is adorable. I keep going back and ordering more colors for my college age daughter. It looks so cute on her with jeans, Lulu shorts, little cargo pants or even workout leggings. It’s also very versatile. She dresses it up and wears it out at night and also wears it to class with sweats during the day! I highly recommend it!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Came back for more!
reviews.reviewText: I have a few double lined shirts and as soon as I put this on, I knew it was the best! It felt as soft as fleece on the inside (without the bulk or heat) and isn’t see through at all— it honestly even smoothed out my bra lines. I’m 5’8” and the sleeves were a perfect length and don’t budge up when I move, and it hit around my belly button/ at the top of high waisted jeans. Very happy medium between regular length and a lot of crop tops in my opinion. I came back for more colors!!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I want one in every color
reviews.reviewText: Seriously the most comfy fitting long sleeve I own. It’s so so soft, the double layer makes it feel heavy duty without overheating, and the fit and color are way better than I thought they would be. Highly recommend

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Save your money
reviews.reviewText: This shirt was very disappointing. It fits so tight. It’s not a flattering fit or material. I returned this.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewText: this brand has pretty good quality, it’s a really nice skims dupe. I hate cheap see-through T-shirts that you only wear a couple of times and toss, this is a good one to keep around that will wash well and hold up over time. Definitely worth the price

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Buttery soft, super comfy
reviews.reviewText: so soft and comfortable! not see through at all. it fits true to size, i sized down this time so it would be a bit more snug. the only thing is it’s a little loose at the wrists, so is the other shirt i’ve ordered from this brand, but it’s not a big deal to me.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I'm usually not one to show my mid-drift as I can be embarrassed of my stomach area, this shirt sits almost too short but with high waisted jeans it fits right under the belt line. Super soft material.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cute fit, maybe size down.....
reviews.reviewText: Double lined, not see through. Yeah!! Cute Fit but size chart ran a tiny bit big. I wear a medium junior or small woman's top. 34D bra. Chart said to order XL. Arms were roomy and fit was fitted but not tight. The cropped length was perfect for me. I'm 5'8 and met the top of my pants. I kept the XL but if I ordered again I'd size down a size to a large. If you want a more snug fit, order your regular size and ignore the chart😉
